**IonSwitch: Dallas**

Hello!  IonSwitch has expanded to Dallas, Texas, USA and been hosting private workloads out of two Texas data centers for over a year.  We have consolidated down to what we feel is the more robust option at Carrier-1 and have started to open up public VPS hosting.  

Similar to our Seattle, Washington site we own all our equipment, IP addresses, network (AS16584) routers, switches and hypervisors.  Multiple upstream carriers and DDOS protection.

**Notes**
- No outgoing SMTP - my life is too short.
- No BGP at this time. 
- No customer referrals for these deals.
- Looking glass isn't up yet -- 204.9.36.6 is a test IP

**Host Nodes**
E5-2670 (or better) - Same as Seattle.
6 disk RAID10 Enterprise SSD
128GB per hypervisor
Dedicated resources per VPS (see KB) - no overselling.
